dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
Dear Messrs, 
The following blog on http://www.blogger.com 

In the following archived post to that blog, under the title ?LUCAS FUCK BRANDON 
CODY?: 

http://todoscurtem. blogspot.com/2005_12_01_todoscurtem_archive.html
 
contains the following material owned by my company, Excelsior Media LLP: 

http://photos1.b1ogger.com/blogger/6960/1634/400/coy33771.jpg 
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/6960/1634/400/cody17.0.jpg 
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/6960/1634/400/cody8.1.jpg
Further, on that same blog, the user again violates Excelsior Media LLP?s copyright in the blog?s November 2005 archive located here: 
http://todoscurtem. blogspot.com/2005_11_01_todoscurtem_archive.html
 
by posting to blogger.com, without our permission, the following images: 
http://photos1.b1ogger.com/blogger/6960/1634/400/cody17.jpg 
http://photos1.b1ogger.com/blogger/6960/1634/400/005.jpg

that are owned, by Excelsior Media LLP. 

The user does not use timestamps or configure his blog in a manner that allows us to identify individual posts, but I have notified you of the exact locations of our copyrighted images, from which the user has removed our watermarks. 

I can be contacted at: 
[private]@excelsiormeda.com
ph: [private]
fax: [private]
and my name is [private], of Excelsior Media LLP
. 
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 
[private]
Excelsior Media LLP
